Controller: NDUFS, NOS1, NOS2, NOS3, NQO1, XDH
Summary: Biochemical reaction from doxorubicin to doxorubicin semiquinone. This interaction can be catalyzed by NOS1, NOS2, NQO1, NOS3, XDH or NDUFS (NDUFS2, NDUFS3, NDUFS7).
Biochemical reaction from doxorubicin semiquinone to doxorubicin, reactive oxygen species.
Biochemical reaction from doxorubicin hydroxyaglycone to doxorubicinol hydroxyaglycone.
Biochemical reaction from doxorubicin to doxorubicin hydroxyaglycone.
Biochemical reaction from doxorubicin to doxorubicin deoxyaglycone. This interaction can be catalyzed by POR, NQO1 or XDH.
Biochemical reaction from doxorubicin to doxorubicinol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CBR1, AKR1A1, CBR3 or AKR1C3.
Transport from doxorubicin to doxorubicin. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC2, ABCG2, RALBP1, ABCB1 or ABCC1.
Transport from doxorubicin to doxorubicin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLC22A16.
